metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: • Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded ch...

subsection_analysis.refined_text: in a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned . add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened .
in a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat . cook sliced chicken, bell pepper, and onion until chicken is cooked through .
in a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned . add diced onion, minced garlic, grated carrot, diced celery . sauté until vegetables are tender .
in a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat . sauté onion, garlic, zucchini, and bell pepper until tender .
in a bowl, mix honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic, and ginger . pour over the ribs and bake for 2. 5 hours .
